title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Perceptual Sequence Learning Simulation: Comparison of Explicit and Implicit Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Mathematical Pattern Recognition, Color Discrimination, and Reaction Speed Test Experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more perceptual sequence patterns with 85% accuracy
Differences in sequence recognition strategies under explicit/implicit learning conditions are reported by over 70% of participants
Average response time reduced by 0.5 seconds during simulation task performance (pre-post assessment comparison)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
